name: Relic Rides
description:
Relic Rides (Formerly Ancient Rides) is a voxel simulation style game. Complete the objectives by picking up ancient civilians using a chariot. 

Set in ancient worlds Relic Rides provides fun, engaging gameplay whilst exploring how ancient word used transport. Pickup historical passengers and take them to their desired destination. 

The game was submitted to the Ludum Dare 37 contest with “One Room” as the theme and I have been working on the gameplay and mechanics ever since.

Keyboard Controls

Arrow Keys - Turn
Ctrl/Right Mouse Click - Accelerate
Left Alt/Left Mouse Click - Reverse

Gamepad Controls
A - to Accelerate
B - To Reverse
Analogue stick - Turn

Take them for a ride!
